ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Route_Template__r.cgcloud__Tour_Template__r.cgcloud__Consider_Vehicle__c ,'TruckTrailer'), OR( ISBLANK( cgcloud__Default_Truck__c ), ISBLANK( cgcloud__Trailer_1__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Default Truck and the Trailer 1 can't be empty.
